name: efface
content:
efface verb
(REMOVE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ T ] formal to remove something intentionally: The whole country had tried to efface the memory of the old dictatorship.

efface verb
(BE MODEST)
efface yourself
to behave in a modest way and treat the good things that you have achieved as if they are not important, often because you do not have much confidence See also
self-effacing
